attributes.action: Noel Gallagher to receive a Knighthood for contribution to music.
attributes.additional_details: Google his name, music, lyrics or his bands name and remember he is now a major part of British culture globally.
attributes.background:
If McCartney got one and Lennon gave his back whilst they smoked weed in Buckingham palace, Mr Gallagher certainly deserves one and in fact it's overdue. 

Also Elizabeth gave one to Mr Saville which is now surely up for grabs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
